favorites.description: These are my favorite sites that I'd like to feature.

items.title: DXD Tech
items.description: A very well made site, even if it's not oozing with early 2000s aesthetics.

items.title: Cathode Ray Dude
items.description: An amazing technology channel featuring interesting PCs, old A/V equipment, and weird software.

items.title: Rerez
items.description: Covering video games that are "Just Bad" to gaming hardware that's the "Worst Ever".

items.title: PSNProfiles
items.description: Excellent crowd-sourced trophy guides for many games, helps me with actually completing games.

items.title: Completionist.me
items.description: Similar to PSNProfiles, but for Steam and RetroAchievements. Has a Kanban board for each game. Links to Steam Community Guides.

items.title: PCPartPicker
items.description: Excellent resource for finding the best price on PC hardware.

items.title: IsThereAnyDeal
items.description: Finds deals on PC games on authorized key merchants. Set up your wishlist to receive e-mail notifications when a game you want is on sale.

items.title: DekuDeals
items.description: Similar to IsThereAnyDeal, but for PlayStation 4 and 5 games in various retailers (Amazon, Target, etc).

items.title: PSDeals
items.description: PSDeals is a similar site that allows for browsing PS3 and PS Vita stores, as well as the modern consoles.

items.title: PSPrices
items.description: PSPrices is another similar site for all console and mobile platforms, but with a pricier premium subscription and a slightly worse UI.
